column1: #Text=Zhao says : " So a twelve - year - old boy bested you and your firebenders .
#Text=" Zhao says : " No , it will not .
#Text=Because you wo n't have a second chance .
#Text=" Zuko says : " Commander Zhao , I 've been hunting the Avatar for two years and I - " Zhao says : " And you failed !
#Text=Capturing the Avatar is too important to leave in a teenager 's hands .
